kafka_topic.description: The name of the Kafka topic to consume messages from.

output_dataset.description: The output dataset to write the messages to.

log_level.description: The logging level to use for the plugin.

key_schema.description: The type of key schema. Choices: Bytes, String, Json, Avro, Json Schema

key_schema_str.description: The string representation of the key schema, if applicable.

value_schema.description: The type of value schema. Choices: Bytes, String, Json, Avro, Json Schema

value_schema_str.description: The string representation of the value schema, if applicable.

consumer_close_time.description: The time in seconds after which the consumer should be closed.
